name: Boxes of Trouble
description:
The boxes are bad. The boxes are on an rampage. How long can you survive?

It is very simple in nature, and has just one objective, to survive. Let's see how many days (and nights) you can survive.

Are you up to the challenge? 

Make weird base. Stumble and fall. Discover different strategies to survive the longest.

Future Plan:

  • More backgrounds
  • Achievements
  • Costumes
